snippet: Mr. Vaughan, known for a decorous manner and democratic instincts, worked with a wide range of writers, including Dwight D. Eisenhower, William F. Buckley Jr. and Fannie Flagg.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Vaughan, known for a decorous manner and democratic instincts, worked with a wide range of writers, including Dwight D. Eisenhower, William F. Buckley Jr. and Fannie Flagg.

headline.seo: Samuel S. Vaughan, Publisher and Author, Dies at 83
headline.main: Samuel S. Vaughan, Publisher at Doubleday, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Samuel S. Vaughan, Publisher at Doubleday, Dies at 83
